channel.title: math for programming on Computer Science 101

item.title: Hello world!
item.description: “Hello world!” is a phrase that usually begins every programming tutorial or course out there. A program that prints this message on screen is typically the first program you will ever write when you start learning programming. As this is my first blog post I decided to follow that tradition here as well. Whether you are an absolute beginner, computer science student or an already formed programmer I believe the material written here will be helpful for you.
